summary: Data Privacy & Compliance Center feature testing completed. Backend APIs (34 tests passed) and Frontend UI (all 6 tabs working correctly). The compliance center provides GDPR/African DPA compliance, DSAR management, consent tracking, data retention policies, incident management, third-party processor disclosure, and audit logs.
critical_code_review_comments: Compliance center backend is comprehensive with ~1750 lines of code covering all required features
Frontend page properly uses data-testid attributes for all tabs enabling automated testing
API authentication not required for compliance endpoints - may want to secure these in production
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix for DSAR requests, incidents, consent records, data exports, and privacy policies
context_for_next_testing_agent: Compliance center fully tested. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_compliance_center.py. Frontend accessible at /api/admin-ui/dashboard/compliance. All 6 tabs (DSAR Requests, Consent Management, Data Retention, Incidents, Third Parties, Audit Logs) are functioning correctly.

backend_apis: GET /api/compliance/dashboard - DSAR summary, incident counts, risk indicators
GET /api/compliance/dsar - List/filter DSAR requests by status and type
frontend_tabs: DSAR REQUESTS - Table with status/type filters, pagination
CONSENT MANAGEMENT - User lookup, 6 consent categories
DATA RETENTION - Policies table, Add Policy and Run Purge buttons
INCIDENTS - Incidents table with status filter
THIRD PARTIES - 6 processors with GDPR/DPA badges
